# Tranquil Trail Travels

> Your premium guide to Northeast India

Premium customized travel itineraries for Northeast India — Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Meghalaya & Nagaland. Luxury journeys crafted for the discerning traveler.

## Destinations

- **Assam**: Wildlife & Tea Heritage — encounter the one-horned rhino at Kaziranga and discover Majuli, the world's largest river island.
- **Arunachal Pradesh**: Monasteries & Hidden Valleys — from Tawang's Buddhist monasteries to Mechuka's pristine valleys.
- **Meghalaya**: Living Bridges & Waterfalls — trek to ancient living root bridges and witness spectacular waterfalls.
- **Nagaland**: Tribal Heritage & Alpine Meadows — experience Konyak warrior culture in Mon and trek the legendary Dzukou Valley.
